name: version-counter
description: Updates variable groups for version number increases
author: John Easterday

inputs.name: variablegroupname
inputs.label: Variable Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable group where your version number is stored

inputs.name: variablename
inputs.label: Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that holds your version number

inputs.name: maxpatch
inputs.label: Maximum Patch Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum value for your patch number before the minor number increments

inputs.name: maxminor
inputs.label: Maximum Minor Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum value for your minor number before the major number increments
